info.title: Workout Match
info.description: Create, copy and shared custom workouts and exercises between users.

value.message: The following fields are required: password.
The following fields are required: email.
The following fields are required: email, password.

get.description: Route to get all users registered.

401.description: Unauthorized. Errors related to the process of getting the token in the header and decoding it.

get.description: Route to get the authenticated user information.

401.description: Name, email and password are required.

value.menssage: Name, email and password are required.

put.description: Route to update the registered user.

400.description: Is just allowed to update name email and password.

value.message: Is just allowed to update name email and password.

get.description: Route to get all users exercises registered. Exercises copied by an user not appear in this request.

404.description: There aren't exercises available. No user registered exercises.

201.description: The request was successful. The exercise was created.

400.description: Error due to missing required fields provided by the client side.

value.message: The following fields are required: exercise.
The following fields are required: sets.
The following fields are required: reps.
The following fields are required: type.
The following fields are required: exercise, sets, reps, type.

get.description: Route to get an exercise by id.

put.description: Route to update an exercise by id.

400.description: Id passed as parameter is invalid or the exercise wasn't updated.

value.message: The exercise was deleted with success.

400.description: Id passed as parameter is invalid or the exercise wasn't deleted.

post.description: Route to copy an exercise. It can be the user's own or another user's.

get.description: Route to get all registered and copied user's exercises.

404.description: There aren't exercises created or copied. No user registered exercise.

get.description: Route to get all users workouts registered. Workout created by user not appear in this request.

404.description: There aren't workouts available. No user registered workouts.

201.description: The request was successful. The workout was created.

400.description: As a prerequisite that there is at least one exercise in the array of exercises. Exercises also need to be created or copied by the user.

404.description: The user, exercises and workout are checked during the request.

get.description: Route to get an workout by id.

put.description: Route to update an workout. It is possible to add or remove exercises, including the id in the exercises array or removing the id.

400.description: Id passed as parameter is invalid or training has not been updated. In the situation of updating exercises, errors related to the exercise may occur.

404.description: Exercises or Workout not found in database.

value.message: The workout was deleted with success.

400.description: Id passed as parameter is invalid or the exercise wasn't deleted.

post.description: Route to copy an workout. It can be the user's own or another user's.

400-ObjectIdCheck.description: Id passed as parameter is invalid.

401-ifParamIdIsUserIdCheck.description: Id passed as parameter not linked to the user.

value.message: This id is not linked to this user.
Is required at least one exercise.
You need to copy theses exercises first : '644a7d690ff85088d51fcb4c'
